name: The Last Battle (Range Games)
description:
The project is being carried out by our Range Gamers team. Their story takes place in a distant world, where elite governments dominate the rest of society, so new laws, new ways of bribery and a new "just kidding" come to them ...

This beta is releasing only 2 cars and 3 types of weapons, being a conquerable, its tunning mode is locked in this version ...

The beta also has 2 free maps, being the same unlocked with the quest ...
The rest is still in the test phase so they are disabled from this version.

The Range Games team thanks everyone who tests and asks them to comment on bugs and bug in the game, it is worth mentioning that this is the first beta test of the game ...
